verses.roman:
mukunda kahe,--'mahāprabhu sannyāsa kariyā
nīlācale āilā saṅge āmā-sabā lañā

synonyms: mukunda kahe—Mukunda Datta replies; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sannyāsa kariyā—after accepting the renounced order of life; nīlācale—to Jagannātha Purī; āilā—has come; saṅge—with Him; āmā-sabā—all of us; lañā—taking.
translation: Mukunda Datta continued, "After accepting the sannyāsa order, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu has come to Jagannātha Purī and has brought all of us with Him.
